titles.title: Montgomery GI Bill Parity Act of 2021
A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to authorize concurrent use of Department of Defense Tuition Assistance and Montgomery GI Bill-Selected Reserve benefits, and for other purposes.
Montgomery GI Bill Parity Act of 2021

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Montgomery GI Bill Parity Act of 2021
This bill authorizes the payment of Montgomery GI Bill benefits to Selected Reserve or Ready Reserve members who are pursuing off-duty training or education as if the individuals were not also eligible to receive, or in receipt of, tuition assistance for such types of training. Under the bill, an individual who wishes to receive such benefits must elect to do so.
